entry.title: Beetroot Cookies
entry.summary:
You never know one Beetroot can eat what a long time~
today I cook homemade self creative cookies for fun, and it's cooked in middle night, so it's supper devil😈 for me.
The another reason I cook that is I watched 《RACHEL KHOO'S KITCHEN NOTEBOOK: LONDON》

and the first her Documentary:
entry.content:
You never know one Beetroot can eat what a long time~
today I cook homemade self creative cookies for fun, and it's cooked in middle night, so it's supper devil😈 for me.
The another reason I cook that is I watched 《RACHEL KHOO'S KITCHEN NOTEBOOK: LONDON》

and the first her Documentary:

Firstly：the beetroot is look like this below~

And how to made it? here is the answer:
1: Mix shredded beetroot with flour and butter, also the fruit oatmeal~
2: Using fresh keeping film cover the mixed flour and using rolling pin to roll it flat.

3: Puting out my Christmas tree mould to shape the cookies.

4: Then puting into oven 180 degree for 25 mins, done~

Aha! Super easy!
Right?!

entry.title: Spring Cocktail～
entry.summary: Today I feel a little bit headache, so after work I go back home, enjoy my homemade cocktail🍹 and youTube vlog.
entry.content:
Today I feel a little bit headache, so after work I go back home, enjoy my homemade cocktail🍹 and youTube vlog.

That drink is my first create cocktail. the inspiration is from my Beetroot juice, and the successful cocktail Pina colada🍸：
Pineapple, coconut, rum, ice～
the taste is really good but I forget take photo about that.

but my home made cocktail 《the blood eyes》 and 《the eyes in bood》 is record by phone.
🥃《the blood eyes》easy and beautiful~


Recipe:

  1. ice ball
  2. rum
  3. beetroot juice

🥃《the eyes in bood》
Firstly you need made the beetroot juice and freeze them to ice...


Recipe:

  1. beetroot juice ball
  2. rum

I personal like the second cocktail more, cos the sweet flavour will release slowly, and the sweat taste is from the nature beetroot juice, so it's super organic and cool~

entry.title: Japanese one-day meal
entry.summary:
After coming back to nomal daily life, in the off work day, I cooked one-day meal all below to japanese style, that's my special sunday life~
Now let's enjoy the mealS and the movie together.
entry.content:
After coming back to nomal daily life, in the off work day, I cooked one-day meal all below to japanese style, that's my special sunday life~
Now let's enjoy the mealS and the movie together.

1:🐟
The first meal cooked by my hunsband!👍
《Autumn story》-Japanese fry saury with lemon sauce

Super nice fried saury skin with lemon juice, tasting little sour and yami~

2:😼
Second meal is my idea form the Japanese drama 《絶メシロード 》2020.

《Fry needle》

but I cooked a little bit sticky, how to improve is a problem.
we enjoy two movie during the dinner time~

3:👅
Last meal is my husband bento for tomorrow~
《Smile Lunch》-Japanese style rice with egg with tomato sauce.

my hunsband give a very high comment next day.🙌

entry.title: Valentine's day~
entry.summary:

such a happy day!
entry.content:
Real Valentine's Big Day is coming~🌹
I have such a surprise that my husband🐎🐴 buy me a bunch of real rose.
such a happy day!


here she is~

I still love the look she real is best.

cos this day what is happend, one of those rose is broken, so I send it to little prince~
wow, I strong believe that he like itlol~~

you see!
I put some of them into my small glass vase on the dressing table.

Putting rest of them separately into two glass vase. one with my light green sofa;💄

anther with my dining table and wine~🍷

In the sunny day, I put them on the ground of balcony, to absorb the full of sunlight.🐝



🌷🌹🌹🌹🌷Soooooooo lovely they are~
💛l love rose, but love the person who give me more💛.

entry.title: Paper folding day!
entry.summary:
The 2020 valentine's day is coming soon~
I will folding a rose for my husband, cos I can't go outside to buy one.
now let's begin!
entry.content:
The 2020 valentine's day is coming soon~
I will folding a rose for my husband, cos I can't go outside to buy one.
now let's begin!

1 step:
now I prepare 4 papers, 3 is red and 1 is green, the size is 15cm, 11cm, 9cm, 6cm, and the 13cm green one.

2 step:
Start following step to folding the 15cm red one.
-Folding the paper quarter to quarter, made a cross in middle.

-Folding the paper from four quarters to middle.

-Fold up again.

-And again.

-Folding again from back side.

-Then start fold each quarter from the 1/2 middle line.

-Turn back the paper, the gathering the four quarters to middle.

-like this below...⬇️ back view～

-turn back again and fold up the middle four quarters turn to outside.

-Then turn back to make sure each piece of petals are curly.
3 step:
Folding the rest 2 red papers up, the gluing them one by one, from bottom to top.

4 step:
Folding the green one up, and stick it on the back of the rose. (back to back)
yes, you are right, that's it!

5 step:
Final step is sticking the rose flower on the top of stick, here you are, its done~

So I have the fantastic gift to my husband, and now is 11pm, the rose will waiting for him till tmw morning...
then being the first one say "good morning~" to him~

entry.title: Growing plants day!
entry.summary: No matter raining ⛅⛈or shinny day🌝🌟, the plants always grow, sometime we go to see them at night, we realized they suddenly become taller and bigger than yesterday, such a magic life power!🌱🌱🌱🌱🌼🌼🌼🌼
entry.content:
No matter raining ⛅⛈or shinny day🌝🌟, the plants always grow, sometime we go to see them at night, we realized they suddenly become taller and bigger than yesterday, such a magic life power!🌱🌱🌱🌱🌼🌼🌼🌼

📷Shooting them when they are still baby~




☂And that day is cloudy day, those little babies are still quite strong~
1 week later~in a big sunny day🌞, they grow like a superman.




🌿The little green onion and garlic shoot will grow happy and lovely, I put some adorable toys for them, 🐤🐥🐣I believe that accompany will be the best way to give them power.




Wow~ forget to give them name:

  1. 👦green onion (scallion)
  2. 👧garlic shoot
  3. 👨coriander
  4. 👩mint
  5. 👱celery
  6. 👳rosemary
  7. 👶world seed
  8. 👸Scindapsus
    that's all.👪

entry.title: Creating wardrobe folder day!
entry.summary:
Today I plan to arrange the wardrobe and put them into folder then analysis them.
how I do this?
Firstly， taking photo of all my clothing and drop them to different folder.
entry.content:
Today I plan to arrange the wardrobe and put them into folder then analysis them.
how I do this?
Firstly， taking photo of all my clothing and drop them to different folder.


Each of the folder build by different category. such as top folder.

Then I find I total create 17 styles and overall have 152 pieces in winter wardrobe.

I can clear to see which category is the most one. sweater in winter is my favorite style.

Sportswear and sleepwear are also what I like, that can reflect the lifestyle and personal taste.

From the top folder, I realize that sweater and shirt is my best choice to mix and match inside, hoodies and vest are not super popular for me to wear everyday.
yes, you are right! I am the shirt person~
maybe later I will write the everyday's look for you~

entry.title: White sesame day!
entry.summary: When my husband want me cook sesame ball to him today👅, I have a sudden idea👀, why we only have white sesame ball but never have black sesame ball❤?
entry.content:
When my husband want me cook sesame ball to him today👅, I have a sudden idea👀, why we only have white sesame ball but never have black sesame ball❤?


I want have a try but next time...
Cos I realize that when you fry to black sesame, you can't recognize when the balls are cooked.🍳🍴
How to cook the lovely sesame ball?

✅1 step:
Prepare white glutinous rice flour 80g,
then put 45g sugar into 105g water then boil it.


✅2 step:
mixing flour with sugar water to make the dough, if it too soft and stick, putting 20g flour to mix again. kneading the dough until it have smooth surface.

✅3 step:
Spreading the flour on board and put 1/3 red bean paste, then cutting it to 18 little pieces and rolling the to become balls.



✅4 step:
Adding 2g oil to the dough mix and waiting the dough for 30mins, rolling the dough to a long piece and cutting it to 7 small segments.

✅5 step:
Pressing the segment dough middle down and put the red bean ball inside, then rolling it to small white ball.




✅6 step:
Preparing one bowl of flour water and one bowl of white sesame.

✅7 step:
Putting white ball into flour water to wet it and then putting into sesame bowl to stick on the white sesame all around the ball.



✅8 step:
heating the Vegetable oil to 120 degree, keeping use the small fire to fry half of them, use spoon or chopsticks to Keep stirring them， In case them stick together.

✅9 step:
Waiting for them turn into yellow gold color.

✅10 step:
Then take them out and put into plate, done!

⏰Super lovely and beautiful white sesame ball is done, 🐵the little prince is soooooooooooo greedy for it，how poor the cat is, cos it smells so good! Lol~

entry.title: Sunny morning day!
entry.summary:
Hello✨ my Sunday morning~🙆🌈
🍞🍎🍵🍳🍮
Getting up from bed at 9:20am, and opening the curtain, such a big sunny day!
entry.content:
Hello✨ my Sunday morning~🙆🌈
🍞🍎🍵🍳🍮
Getting up from bed at 9:20am, and opening the curtain, such a big sunny day!

Today will start at a big super nice breakfast!
(Black tea with lemon+apple+milk jujube+ egg with green pepper sandwich).

then open the youtube channel, watching the vlogs and enjoy the meal~

Haha~my cat: price come to find me, cos the smell of the sandwich, he is supper tortoiseshell cat～🐱

Come on! My Prince~

Cute boy~

After he can't get anything, he go to enjoy the Sunday free sunshine～

I play with him then realize he like play with curtain, so curiosity a boy～

😽Getting old and enjoying the lovely life with my little price~

So everyone:

🌞
Good morning~💙💚💛💜

entry.title: Organize my wardrobe day!
entry.summary:
Organize my wardrobe always in my mind,
but never done...
In the such a long Chinese 2020 new year holiday😷, I decided to clean the room and clear my personal organize theory.
entry.content:
Organize my wardrobe always in my mind,
but never done...
In the such a long Chinese 2020 new year holiday😷, I decided to clean the room and clear my personal organize theory.

✅1 step:
Separate the clothings to 6 big areas and 22 small styles.
You can separate your clothings by your personal styles.

✅2 step:
Making my clothing arrange rolls.
I design two sizes for different styles.
small size: top/blouse/pants/skirt/thin sweater.
big size: hoodies/thick sweater.

✅3 step:

Rolling one piece of clothing into the arrange roll.
white one is small size, yellow one is big size.

✅4 step:

Putting different color rolls in different area.
Separate the wardrobe bulkhead to 3 parts.
(pants+skirt, top+blouse, hoodies+sweater).

✅5 step:
Putting all the rolls on it area, and hanging easy wrinkle clothing on hangers.

😉Cherry winks~
Next article will introduce how I organize the sportswear/underwear/socks/stockings box📦.
